alert.note: Alert for Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 3:29PM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
